item.title: [Machine learning] Understanding decision trees from both scikit-learn and mathematics
item.description: #1. Purpose If you want to do machine learning, anyone can use scikit-learn etc. to implement it relatively easily. However, in order to achieve results at work or to improve your level, The explanation “I don’t really understand the background but I got this result” clearly shows the weakness. In this article, the purpose of ** is 2-3, “I will use scikit-learn first because the theory is good,” and 4 and “understand the background from mathematics” **.

item.title: About sklearn.preprocessing.Imputer
[Machine learning] Understand logistic regression from both scikit-learn and mathematics
item.description: #1. Purpose If you want to do machine learning, anyone can use scikit-learn etc. to implement it relatively easily. However, in order to achieve results at work or to improve your level, The explanation “I don’t really understand the background, but I got this result” is clearly weak. In this article, the two aims are to “use the scikit-learn first because the theory is good” and to “understand the background from mathematics” from the fourth and later.

item.title: Build JupyterLab (Python) environment with Docker
item.description: # What we could achieve Since we were able to build the following environment with Docker, we summarized the flow from Docker image build to JupyterLab startup. Easy Python version switching (Python3 â‡„ Python2) Easy startup of JupyterLab 1 Can be deleted as soon as the environment is no longer needed I want to easily build an environment on Mac and Windows Actually built environment macOS Catalina (MacBook Pro(15-inch, Late2016)) Windows 10 Docker image You need to login to get it.

item.title: How to use machine learning for work? 03_Python coding procedure
item.description: ## Introduction So far, I’ve delivered an article with the theme “How to use machine learning for work?” In this third installment, we will introduce concrete programming under the theme of “Python coding procedure”. If you also read the back number, you can understand the whole from machine learning basics to Python coding, so please use it. Part 1: Understanding the purpose of machine learning Part 2: Overview of AI development project Since various information is also sent on SNS, please feel free to read the article.

item.title: I tried FX technical analysis with AI scikit-learn
item.description: ### table of contents at first Document structure Document contents (excerpt) The process that left an impression Where to get “PDF version document and data set for execution” 1. at first It is a water strider. (Of course the pen name) Actually, the author has continued to develop EA for MT4 (MQL4) for a long time, hoping to make a profit if it can be done by a hobby, and for the past 1-2 years, especially MT4 and AI should be linked (especially non-technical analysis).

item.title: I tried handwriting recognition of runes with scikit-learn
item.description: This article is from the 15th day of the Fujitsu Systems Web Technology Advent Calendar. (Promise) The content of this article is my own opinion and does not represent the organization to which I belong. Introduction In this article, we use scikit-learn, a Python machine learning library. I have summarized the procedure and the result when I tried handwriting recognition of runes **. While the advent calendars of this Advent Calendar are putting in great features and know-how that are likely to be useful for actual work, However, I made something that was just fun for me, and I cannot help being so enthusiastic.

item.title: Matching application I tried to take statistics of strong people & created a machine learning model
item.description: #Introduction Hello everyone. Do you use a matching app? ! I feel good as one of those who have recently matched with a matching app. By the way, the matching app I was using was able to refer to the data of other popular members. (Probably people who have received more than 100 like are displayed.) When I saw it, I was disappointed. “Like, I didn’t get 100…” ** “I want to be a man who exceeds 100” **
